level.text: Subject to subsection 7801.2, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at midnight of December 31 of each even-numbered year.
The Director may change the renewal system and the expiration dates of licenses issued pursuant to this chapter pursuant to subsection 4006.3.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4336, 4337 (May 20, 2011).
